page.title: 17EDUCATION: FOREIGN STUDENTS
page.content: THE{STUDENTS,}WHO COME TO STAY IN {WEYMOUTH,}FOR A FEW WEEKS DURING THE SUMMER, ARE VARIOUS NATIONALITIES. WE HAVE MAINLY CHILDREN FROM THE{EUROPEAN {CONTRIES. THE MAIN REASON FOR THEIR STAY IN {ENGLAND,}IS TO PRACTISE AND IMPROVE THE{ENGLISH LANGUAGE}AND BECOME FAMILIAR WITH THE{CULTURE}OF THE {COUNTRY. THE{STUDENTS GO TO SCHOOL}(HIRED CHURCH OR COMMUNITY HALLS) DURING THE MORNING FROM 9.00 TO 12.00. DURING THE AFTERNOON THEY PARTICIPATE IN SPORTING ACTIVITIES:{FOOTBALL, NETBALL, {BASKETBALL, FISHING, SAILING, RIDING, {CANOEING AND VOLLEY BALL.}THE MAJORITY OF STUDENTS ENJOY GOING TO{DISCOS}AND {DAY TRIPS,}LIKE SHOPPING IN{ {BOURNEMOUTH }AND{LONDON.
